dcterms:creator: D. Kollias
A. Arsenos
S. Kollias
dcterms:description: COV19-CT-DB includes 3D chest CT scans annotated for existence of COVID-19. It consists of 1,650 COVID and 6,100 non-COVID chest CT scan series, corresponding to a high number of patients and subjects. The dataset is split into training, validation, and testing sets, with specific splits for severity classification.
dcterms:title: COV19-CT-DB
